docs.lead_paragraph: A man has been arrested and charged with murdering his former New York City high school teacher and the son he had with her, authorities said on Wednesday, five years after a scandal over their relationship made headlines.
docs.snippet: A man has been arrested and charged with murdering his former New York City high school teacher and the son he had with her, authorities said on Wednesday, five years after a scandal over their relationship made headlines....

docs.lead_paragraph: Family and friends of an American jailed in Egypt for nearly three years are hoping her time in custody may end soon.

docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump hammered rival Hillary Clinton during the presidential campaign for failing to prevent the attack on the U.S. mission in Benghazi, Libya, when she was secretary of state. Soon he'll be the one responsible for protecting America's diplomats, but he's offered little insight into how he'll do that.

headline.print_headline: Pressure's On for Trump to Make Diplomats Safer
headline.main: Pressure's On for Trump to Make Diplomats Safer

docs.lead_paragraph: We have an immigration policy today that few Americans support or voted for.
docs.snippet: We have an immigration policy today that few Americans support or voted for....
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Republican Sen Tom Cotton of Arkansas asserts recent immigration policy has disproportionately benefited wealthy by providing ever-cheaper labor and services; argues overhauling system in favor of high-skilled immigrant workers would raise wages and provide better job security for working and middle class.

headline.main: Fix Immigration. It’s What Voters Want.
headline.print_headline: Fix Immigration. It’s What Voters Want.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kerry will use his remarks to confront Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel after bitterness over a United Nations resolution, a State Department official said.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from Mumbai.

docs.snippet: Mr. Kerry will use his remarks to confront Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel after bitterness over a United Nations resolution, a State Department official said....
docs.abstract: Sec of State John Kerry prepares final bid for Israeli-Palestinian peace accord in speech that will build on 2014 failed attempt and include subtle rebuke of Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu; remarks follow Israeli outrage over United States abstention from United Nations resolution denouncing Israel's ongoing building of West Bank settlements.

headline.print_headline: Kerry to Outline Vision of Israeli-Palestinian Accord
headline.main: John Kerry, in a Final, Pointed Plea, Will Outline a Vision of Mideast Peace

docs.lead_paragraph: The tale of an illicit school relationship took a shocking turn on Tuesday when Isaac Duran Infante was charged with two counts of murder in the deaths of Felicia Barahona and their 4-year-old son.

byline.contributor: Eli Rosenberg and Noah Remnick contributed reporting. Alain Delaquérière contributed research.
byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and AL BAKER

docs.snippet: The tale of an illicit school relationship took a shocking turn on Tuesday when Isaac Duran Infante was charged with two counts of murder in the deaths of Felicia Barahona and their 4-year-old son....
docs.abstract: New York Police Dept announces that Isaac Duran Infante has been charged with first-degree murder in deaths of Bronx woman Felicia Barahona and their son, Miguel Barahona; Duran Infante and Barahona were subject of minor tabloid scandal when they were caught in 2012 having sexual relationship while she was his teacher in high school.

headline.print_headline: Former Student Charged With Murder in Killings of Ex-Teacher and Their Son
headline.main: Former Student Is Charged in Killings of Ex-Teacher and Their Son

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Rubin, who was awarded the National Medal of Science in 1993, ushered in the cosmic realization that most of the universe is invisible.
docs.snippet: Dr. Rubin, who was awarded the National Medal of Science in 1993, ushered in the cosmic realization that most of the universe is invisible....
docs.abstract: Vera Rubin, astronomer whose research mapping distribution of mass in spiral galaxies led to discovery of dark matter, invisible missing mass that held galaxies together, and changed how astronomers viewed workings of universe, dies at age 88.

headline.print_headline: Vera Rubin, Scientist Who Opened Doors for Physics and for Women, Dies at 88
headline.main: Vera Rubin, 88, Dies; Opened Doors in Astronomy, and for Women

docs.lead_paragraph: With a businessman in the White House, markets will have to adjust to different views on what constitutes a violation of securities laws.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a new legal development on the controversy over former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's emails, an appeals court on Tuesday reversed a lower court ruling and said two U.S. government agencies should have done more to recover the emails.
